Title: How to upgrade Spilo instances
Description: The tutorial demonstrates how to upgrade a running Spilo cluster with a new version of Docker by creating a snapshot of a running instance first, then changing the cloud formation template, terminating all old instances by one and spawning new from the snapshot created at the previous step and, finally, failover the master, terminate the former master's node and update the CF template again in order to avoid creating new replicas using the outdated snapshot.
